content.question: Which of the following is a logical conclusion that can be derived from the final two paragraphs of the passage?

choices.label: Crazy Horse displayed ferocity and courage in battle and modesty in dress and speech.
Elaborately decorated war apparel is a hindrance on the battlefield.
Crazy Horse’s lone eagle feather symbolized his habit of dismounting in battle.
Crazy Horse rejected praise that didn’t acknowledge the vital role of his war horse.

content.answer: Crazy Horse displayed ferocity and courage in battle and modesty in dress and speech.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
